sentence.text: Genes involved in tissue development, differentiation, and oncogenesis such as DNAJA4, cartilage development, IRX1, BMP8A, GATA4, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, and regulation of erythrocyte differentiation were hypermethylated in both RMS cell lines and primary samples, implicating aberrant DNA methylation in the pathogenesis of rhabdomyosarcoma.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
